sources.title: My Stepmother Is an Alien
sources.description:
Pavel Olevantsev's family unexpectedly receives news that his daughter, the child of another woman, has been orphaned. Pavel had no idea of ​​the girl's existence, and neither could his wife. It's not easy to decide to welcome the child into their home. But it will be far more difficult to win the girl over, to restore her childhood joy and the belief that she is not alone.

Year of production: 1973

Director: Oleg Bondarev
Screenwriter: Edgar Smirnov
Composer: Grigory Ponomarenko
Cinematography: Igor Chernykh
Production Designers: Sergey Portnoy, Nikolay Usachev

Cast: Tamara Sovchi, Vladimir Samoilov, Tatyana Doronina, Nadezhda Fedosova, Leonid Nevedomsky, Lena Kostereva, Alexander Dalekiy

metadata.Plot: An alien is sent on a secret mission to Earth, where she appears as a gorgeous, attractive, and single lady. Her mission is to make contact with a rather nerdy young scientist, who's quite overwhelmed by her attentions, and isn't aware of the connection between her arrival and his work.
metadata.Writer: Jerico Stone, Herschel Weingrod, Timothy Harris
metadata.Actors: Dan Aykroyd, Kim Basinger, Jon Lovitz
